participant_1.background:
I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.
i give lessons on string instruments.
I don't want to talk about my parents.
I read horror novels in secret so my parents don't worry about me.
My favorite vacation was when my wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands.

participant_2.background:
I want to show my music to the world!
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking!
What do you do for fun?
I love to play music and watch movies, especially if they're about aliens invading the earth!
That's so cool! I love to play music too. What kind of music do you play?
I play drums in a band. We're still pretty new, but we're having a lot of fun!
That's awesome! I used to play drums in a band when I was in high school. It was a lot of fun!
I can imagine! It's so much fun to be able to share your music with other people.
Yeah, it really is! I'm glad you're having fun with your band.
Thank you! I'm really excited to see where we can take it.
I'm sure you'll go far! You seem like you're really passionate about it.
Thanks! I really appreciate that.
No problem! What other hobbies do you have?
I love to go into the city for fun and excitement. I also love to make clothes.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.
It's not too hard! You should give it a try.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
You too!
